subject: Simsonn Plus X Manual
description_text:
Hello-
I just received my Plus X pedals, but there wasnâ€™t a manual in the package.
I would like to know how I should swap out the elastomers on the brake.

Can you please send the manual in PDF? I tried looking on the product
webpage, but the links for the product manual on there are broken.

Thanks,
Nick

conversations.body_text: Hi Nick Dodson,    We apologize for not sending you the paper manual! This is a compressed version of the manual. Please let us know if any of the images are unclear.
